landing.transformHome: Transform your home into a thriving plant paradise with our intelligent monitoring system and personalized care recommendations.
landing.comprehensiveSystem: Our comprehensive plant monitoring system gives you all the tools to ensure your plants thrive in any environment.
landing.testimonialDescription: Hear what our community is saying about how PlantSmart has transformed their plant care experience.
landing.readyToTransform: Ready to transform your plant care?
landing.joinThousands: Join thousands of plant lovers who've already made their plants happier and healthier with PlantSmart.
landing.futurePlantCare: The future of plant care, today. Smart monitoring for happier, healthier plants.

features.smartWateringDesc: Our sensors monitor soil moisture and automatically water your plants at the perfect time, ensuring they're never over or under-watered.
features.lightOptimizationDesc: Track light exposure throughout the day and receive recommendations on optimal placement for each of your plants' specific needs.
features.healthAlertsDesc: Get instant notifications about potential health issues, pests, or diseases before they become serious problems.

help.title: Help Center
help.tryDifferent: Try a different search term or browse categories below

testimonial2.quote: As a busy entrepreneur, I never had time for proper plant care. The automated watering system is a game-changer. My plants have never looked better, and I get peace of mind.
testimonial2.name: Marcus Rodriguez

testimonial3.quote: The health alerts saved my fiddle leaf fig from a pest infestation I never would have caught early. The mobile app makes monitoring so convenient and actually fun!
testimonial3.name: Emily Watson

imageRecognition.title: Plant Identification
imageRecognition.noMatch: No match found. Try another photo with better lighting.
imageRecognition.tips: Take a clear photo of the leaves and stem for best results.

tip.default: Monitor soil moisture daily based on current weather conditions.
tip.hot: Hot day ahead. Water your plants early morning or evening to prevent evaporation.
tip.rainy: Rainy weather. Check indoor plants for proper drainage to prevent root rot.
tip.dry: Low humidity. Consider misting your tropical plants to increase humidity.
tip.windy: Windy conditions. Move delicate potted plants to sheltered locations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.cancelAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your Premium features will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
faq.deviceAnswer: No, Premium works with all existing PlantSmart sensors and devices. You'll immediately gain access to new features with your current setup.
faq.trialQuestion: What happens after the free trial?
faq.trialAnswer: After your 14-day trial ends, you'll be automatically subscribed to the Premium plan. We'll send a reminder before charging your payment method.
faq.refundAnswer: We don't offer refunds for partial subscription periods, but you can cancel anytime to avoid future charges.
